item.title: Installing CUDA Toolkit v11.4.2 on Ubuntu
item.description: This guide covers the basic instructions needed to install CUDA and verify that a CUDA application can run on Linux. CUDA on Linux can be installed using an RPM, Debian, Runfile, or Conda package, depending on the platform being installed on. Installing CUDA Toolkit on Ubuntu When installing CUDA on Ubuntu, you can choose between the Runfile Installer and the Debian Installer. The Runfile Installer is only available as a Local Installer.
